item.title: Getting started with excel-formula
item.description: Introduction # Excel formulas are used to process simple or complex equations and output the result to a specific cell within a worksheet. (There is an exception to this where the WorksheetFunction class is used in VBA programming, however VBA is out of scope for this tag - please refer to the excel-vba or vba documentation for VBA related articles.) Formulas can be used to convert, manipulate or evaluate many different kinds of expressions using all different kinds of data.
